name: honorarium
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a usually small amount of money paid to someone for a service for which no official charge is made: We usually offer our visiting lecturers an honorarium of £500.

a sum of money paid to someone for providing a service or winning a prize: The board will meet three times a year and members will be paid a $3,500 honorarium per meeting, plus expenses. The O'Donnell Award for science consists of a $25,000 honorarium and an inscribed statue.
